mapper.sql:
WHERE status = 'BIDDING' AND end_time > systimestamp
AND name LIKE '%' || #{q} || '%'
AND ( category_code = #{category} OR category_code IN (SELECT category_code FROM category WHERE parent_code = #{category}) )
AND (final_price >= #{minPrice} OR start_price >= #{minPrice})
AND (final_price <= #{maxPrice} OR start_price <= #{maxPrice})
